_source.text: After decades as a wasted space a plan was finally in place to create over 1000 permanent jobs; yet the plan was defeated with our own borough president's words, "No jobs are better than minimum wage jobs".

the plan was defeated with our own borough president's words, "No jobs are **better** **than** minimum wage jobs".
